\f0\fs26 \cf0 MonkeyWorks has been installed successfully on this computer. \ \ Please note that if this is the first time that MW has been installed here, you will need to create a "setup variables" file to tell MW details of the physical arrangement of your experimental setup. Experiments will not run correctly until you complete this step.\ \ This file should be called "setup_variables.xml" and belongs in: \ /Library/Application Support/MonkeyWorks/Configuration\ \ Examples can be found in "examples" in this same folder.}
